Entries.Rainy_Night_2: I guess... if I had some trousers I might've gone outside today... but, nah.
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Do me a favour... when I pass away, use my dust to fertilise some corn for the hens.
Entries.Outdoor_1: Sometimes I stop and realise that I'm nothing more than a bag of juicy, squishy flesh.#$e#But hey... that's just fine... what's life, anyway?$h
Entries.TwoKids_2: Ugh... %kid2 is being a little brat today. Must've got that from me...
Entries.Good_3: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnellers won big last night.$h
Entries.Good_6: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnellers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a guy could need.$h
Entries.spring_12: The egg festival is probably my favourite... you know how I am, I go crazy for anything to do with chickens.$h
Entries.summer_27: What are your plans for the autumn? I'm going to try and incorporate more wine into my diet.
